couplings.estimate_notes: lambda_tr_eff replaced by WKB estimate: g_portal * exp(-∫ m_chi dξ).

wall.v_w_note: Estimated wall speed; typical 0.1–0.5 depending on microphysics. Replace with a computed value if available.

notes: All inputs are first-principles except lambda_tr_eff and v_w which are placeholders tied to portal*overlap and wall dynamics; replace when available.
